name: Hypertrophy Split
description: 4-week push/pull/legs rotation focusing on volume and mind-muscle connection.

name: Beginner Full-Body
description: 2-week full-body routine emphasizing form, consistency, and recovery.

name: Kettlebell Burner
description: 3-week kettlebell flow for conditioning and strength endurance.

name: Beginner Running
description: 4-week beginner-friendly run/walk plan to build consistency safely.

name: Half Marathon
description: 8-week progressive plan with easy runs, speed work, long runs, and recovery.

name: Yoga Foundations
description: 3-week progressive yoga plan focused on breath, mobility, and nervous system down-regulation.

name: Calisthenics Foundations
description: A 4-week bodyweight-only progression focused on strength, control, and movement quality.
